name: .DLL File Extension
summary: Learn about .DLL files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Most users will never need to and never should open a DLL file. In fact, opening or modifying a DLL file may cause errors within the program(s) that reference that file, and prevent it from functioning correctly.

However, Windows developers and other advanced users can decompile DLL files to view and modify their contents. Tools that can decompile DLL files include Microsoft Visual Studio, JetBrains dotPeek, Redgate .NET Reflector, and Resource Hacker.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
